attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Middle lane drivers are a huge cause of congestion and frustration on our busy motorway networks. This petition is to emplore the government to produce a national advertising campaign educating drivers on motorway driving and make it socially unacceptable to hog the middle lane of a motorway.
There are a considerable number of drivers who think it is their given right to sit in the middle lane, causing untold congestion and frustration. If "undertaking" is punishable and unacceptable (fines & penalty points) then so should be "hogging".

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
